item.title: Rhythm of War 60 (49-2)
item.itunes:summary: Part 60 of The Stormlight Archive [04] Rhythm Of War [03]
item.description:
This is 2/2 from part of the file part 3/The Stormlight Archive [04] Rhythm Of War [03-06].mp3 Using timecodes 2028.630200955442 to 4057.260401910884
Details ~~~~~ By : Brandon Sanderson
Release Date : April 30, 2021
Approximate Running Time : 7 Hours
Content Rating : Ages 13+
After forming a coalition of human resistance against the enemy invasion, Dalinar Kholin and his Knights Radiant have spent a year fighting a protracted, brutal war. Neither side has gained an advantage, and the threat of a betrayal by Dalinars crafty ally Taravangian looms over every strategic move.

The arms race that follows will challenge the very core of the Radiant ideals, and potentially reveal the secrets of the ancient tower that was once the heart of their strength.
